translations: 递交；主张；屈服（submit 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He submitted his latest novel for review.
sentences.translation: 他提交了自己的最新小说供评论。

sentences.sentence: They submitted their reports to the chancellor yesterday.
sentences.translation: 他们昨天向财政大臣提交了他们的报告。

sentences.sentence: He has submitted himself to the will of God.
sentences.translation: 他已经让自己听从上帝的意旨。
